resources.string:
Kiedy rozpoczyna sie semestr zimowy?
- Zgodnie z Zarządzeniem nr 58/2021/2022 Rektora ANS Tarnow semestr zimowy rozpoczyna sie z dniem 01.10.2021 roku.

Gdzie nalezy złozyc wniosek o wpis warunkowy ?
- Zgodnie z Wytycznymi pani Rektor wnioski o wpisy warunkowe kierujemy do dziekanatu danego wydzialu.

Czy od letniego semestru obowiazuja maseczki podczas zajec?
- Zgodnie z Zarządzeniem nr 80/2021/2022 Rektora ANS Tarnow od semestru letniego 2021/2022 nie ma obowiazku noszenia maseczek

Jaka jest maksymalna liczba studentow na kierunku Informatyka ?
- Zgodnie z Zarządzeniem nr 24/2019/2020 Rektora ANS Tarnow na kierunku Informatyka jest 120 miejsc.

string-array.name: Algorithms
string-array.item: Knows and understands the basics of algorithmics.
Can design basic algorithms, understands the specificity of individual data structures.

He/she is ready to serve the society with his/her knowledge and skills in the field of algorithms and data structures, as well as to cooperate in a group and is aware of the need of continuous self-education and self-improvement.
Is ready to respond to the needs and challenges contemporary society with his/her competent and patriotic attitude.
Basic knowledge of discrete mathematics in terms of set algebra and relational algebra.
Aho A.V., Hopcroft J.E., Ullman J.D., Projektowanie i analiza algorytmów komputerowych, PWN 1983
Wirth N., Algorytmy + struktury danych = programy, WNT

string-array.name: Algebra
string-array.item: Knows and understands mathematical and physical theories and methods used in computer science.
Uses the known methods and mathematical models, as well as computer simulations computer simulations to analyze
Solves problems under changing and not fully predictable.
He is ready to critically evaluate the effects of his work and to recognize knowledge in solving cognitive and practical problems
The concept of complex numbers and operations on them are introduced.
T. Jurlewicz, Z. Skoczylas, Algebra liniowa 1. Definicje, twierdzenia, wzory, Oficyna Wydawnicza GiS, Wrocław 2006
T. Jurlewicz, Z. Skoczylas, Algebra liniowa 2. Definicje, twierdzenia, wzory, Oficyna Wydawnicza GiS, Wrocław 2005

string-array.name: Numerical_Methods
string-array.item: Knows topics in mathematics including linear algebra, analysis, differential equations
He knows basic algorithms and numerical methods, he can compare these methods and determine the conditions of superiority of one over another.
Knows their applicability to engineering problems.
Be able to write and implement algorithms for calculating solutions to technical problems.
He/she can analyze issues of numerical methods in terms of The student is able to analyze issues of numerical methods
J.Kiusalaas, Numerical Methods in Engineering with MATLAB, Cambridge University Press 2010
J. Stoer, Wstęp do metod numerycznych, t. 1, PWN, Warszawa 1979
